name: AL QMRAH RESTAURANT
description:
AL QMRAH RESTAURANT is a FREE Horror Game that has a full game environment based on a real Restaurant in the Real Life called AL QMRAH RESTAURANT.

It’s playable in Solo & Online Mode… it’s also Presents 2 Game Mods:
1- Late Closing - solo/online(co-op)
2- Qmrah Said - online(FFA)
(More Game Modes will be Revealed Soon)
